titleStmt.title: VVit revived: or, a new and excellent way of divertisement, digested into most ingenious questions and answers. / By Asdryasdust Tossoffacan.
titleStmt.author: Gayton, Edmund, 1608-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold at the Brazen Serpent in Saint Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Thomason Received his copy in November 1655.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "November 27"; also the last number of the imprint date have been marked through and replaced with a "5".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Brazen Serpent in Saint Pauls Church-yard.
